<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Set notification policy tree</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"put"} path={"/v1/grafana/api/v1/provisioning/policies"}></MethodEndpoint>



Set notification policy tree. 
Please ensure to change the region in the URL to match your account's region.
